text:
Maxwell Health | Boston, MA | Software Engineer / Senior Software Engineer | ONSITE, REMOTE

At Maxwell, we are inspired by the opportunity to make a difference in society by helping people make better health, wellness and financial decisions. We build applications that support a rich set of interactions among consumers, employers, brokers and product vendors. We view ourselves as the stewards of change for a very complex industry.

We're looking for engineers who love technologies like JavaScript, Go, Python, PHP, Node.js, React, MySQL, and MongoDB.

Interested in working with an awesome team? Reach out to Frank directly at frank+hn [at] maxwellhealth.com or apply online through the links below.

--

Maxwell Health: https://maxwellhealth.com/

Software Engineer: https://maxwell-health.workable.com/j/89FE58E1C3
